amendment.description: To limit international military education and training funds from being made available for Indonesia.

action.text: Senate vitiated previous adoption of amendment SA 1995 by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1995 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1995 proposed by Senator Allard. (consideration: CR S13357-13358, S13366) To limit international military education and training funds from being made available for Indonesia.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1995 proposed by Senator Allard.
